means: 使有生气( animate的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The girls watched, little teasing smiles animating their faces.
sentence.Network_cn: 女孩们注视着，脸上挂着调皮的微笑，显得愈加活泼。

sentence.Network_en: Nature has her animating spirit as well as man who is nature's child.
sentence.Network_cn: 大自然就象它的孩子――人类一样,有活生生的灵魂.

sentence.Network_en: They were doubtlessly the animating principle of many hours that superficially seemed vacant.
sentence.Network_cn: 在表面看来无所事事的许多时刻中,它们无疑是活跃的因素.

entry.def: Something that is animate has life, in contrast to things like stones and machines which do not.

example.ex: ...all aspects of the material world, animate and inanimate.
example.tran: 物质世界的方方面面，包括有生命的和无生命的

entry.tran: 使有生气；使活泼；激励；鼓舞
entry.def: To animate something means to make it lively or more cheerful.

example.ex: There was precious little about the cricket to animate the crowd...
example.tran: 板球比赛能激起观众热情的地方很少。

example.ex: The girls watched, little teasing smiles animating their faces.
example.tran: 女孩们注视着，脸上挂着调皮的微笑，显得愈加活泼。

auth_sentence.content: It is our animating force, which is the definition of spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is our animating force, which is the definition of spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is our animating force, which is the definition of spirit.

auth_sentence.content: Whatever force is animating life in an intelligent manner is not supernatural.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever force is animating life in an intelligent manner is not supernatural.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever force is animating life in an intelligent manner is not supernatural.

auth_sentence.content: How could the first common ancestor have reproduced without animating matter??
auth_sentence.res_content: How could the first common ancestor have reproduced without animating matter??
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How could the first common ancestor have reproduced without animating matter??
